item.title: What can we learn from spotting a Prius or two?
item.description: If you live in a wealthy, liberal town like Boulder, CO, youâ€™ve likely seen your fair share of Toyota Prii (this is supposedly the plural of Prius). Heck, you might even own one. I decided to collect a little data. I used my iPhone stopwatch to record wait times between seeing Prii. I walked at a near-constant speed, along a more or less linear transect along 13th Street, from Arapahoe to Spruce.
